item.title: Someone You Can Build a Nest In
I’ll Miss Myself
item.description: Ahhhhh I love finding an author where one story is SO good that I immediately acquire a new favorite author. In the span of a couple hours I’ve read his other short stories on Uncanny Mag, and started the audiobook for [[books/someone you can build a nest in|Someone You Can Build a Nest In]].
